snippet: Jamie Donaldson secured his place in Europe's team for next month's Ryder Cup at Gleneagles with a storming final round to win the Czech Masters at the Albatross Golf Resort by two shots on Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Donaldson Secures Ryder Cup Place With Czech Victory
headline.main: Donaldson Secures Ryder Cup Place With Czech Victory

lead_paragraph: Jamie Donaldson secured his place in Europe's team for next month's Ryder Cup at Gleneagles with a storming final round to win the Czech Masters at the Albatross Golf Resort by two shots on Sunday.
